project.name: PointSMS
project.description:
PointSMS is an easy to use software, written in php, thats enable you build your own sms gateway, to manage your clients to send invoices and many other features.
PointSMS can be configured to work with Clickatell gateway and Kannel server. (In support section you will find a complete how to guide abou kannel configuration).
Some major features of PointSMS:
* Easy to install and to use * Complete UTF-8 support (Greek language supported) * Easy to manage your clients account (add,modify,delete,disable) * SMS Limits/Credits * Inoice System to send invoices through email to your customers * A complete transaction log * Online software updates * Incoming messages if you use kannel as backend ver 1.0.2 * Flash player if you want to publish sms in tv for example ver 1.0.2 * XML output for incoming sms ver 1.0.2
